TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract CaseClauseSyntax extends Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.VisualBasicSyntaxNode
Public MustInherit Class CaseClauseSyntax Inherits VisualBasicSyntaxNode

Docs.summary: Represents a single clause in a case statement. An abstract node that is the parent of different kinds of Case clauses.
